CustomField.formula: DATE( YEAR( Forecasted_Logical_Decommission_Date__c ), MONTH( Forecasted_Logical_Decommission_Date__c ), CASE( MONTH( Forecasted_Logical_Decommission_Date__c), 1, 31, 2, IF( MOD( YEAR( Forecasted_Logical_Decommission_Date__c), 4) = 0, 29, 28), 3, 31, 4, 30, 5, 31, 6, 30, 7, 31, 8, 31, 9, 30, 10, 31, 11, 30, 12, 31, 0 ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Shows the last day of the month for the Logical decommission date.
CustomField.label: EOM Decom Date
